description: This file contains reusable validation functions for a React-based Tic Tac Toe game frontend, specifically validating board indices, player symbols, and cell occupancy.

methods.name: export function assertValidIndex(index: number): void { assertValidIndex
methods.description: Validates that the index is an integer within the range [0, 8].

methods.name: export function assertValidPlayer(player: string): asserts player is Player { assertValidPlayer
methods.description: Asserts that the player string is either 'X' or 'O'.

methods.name: export function assertCellEmpty(value: string, index: number): void { assertCellEmpty
methods.description: Validates that a cell's value is empty, indicating the cell is unoccupied.

ctags.name: assertCellEmpty
ctags.pattern: /^export function assertCellEmpty(value: string, index: number): void {$/

ctags.name: assertValidPlayer
ctags.pattern: /^export function assertValidPlayer(player: string): asserts player is Player {$/
